author: Jason Anthony
comment: Loved this app, I paid for the premium version.  Compass does not work but neither do other compass apps for my Huawei watch.  I particularly like the customisable widget shortcuts which appear on the watch face. I wish the hands were more distinctive on the analogue face, otherwise highly recommended.

author: Ryan Richardson
comment: I have premium and like the watch face.  It is missing a couple of things. It should include some of the features like Ultra Watch Face. Unread messages and calls. And the shortcuts that are available to choose from are very limited. I would like to be able to set a shortcut to the phone on the watch and cannot.

author: Jenny Eldershaw
comment: Not sure what's wrong but it keeps stopping. Shame. Hopefully developers have a fix.....looks like it could be good, and I've paid for premium too🤔

author: Phillip Thompson
comment: The weather part does not work, stock on celsius.

author: Amey Gat
comment: Wouldn't work at all on Zenwatch with Android Wear 2.0

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Please, install the watch face from wear store located on the watch. UPDATE: any news regarding to this issue?

author: Jayson Plourde
comment: Wanted to try premium... Do I have to download premium from the watch or can I do it on my phone through playstore?

author: Mark Lee
comment: Interactive features have stopped working. Not too impressed.

author: Ray Marx
comment: I purchased it but, since the last update there's no way to change the settings and the app on the phone no longer works!😵😡👾

author: Jay Schmelling
comment: I downloaded it from Android Wear. It went to my phone's home screen instead of to Android Wear. I can't get it on to my fossil Q watch

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Hi, you need to install watchface from Wear store located on the watch.

author: Jason Rennick
comment: Bought premium features but the watch face will not appear on my Fossil watch.

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Hi, you have to install it from Wear Store located on the watch.

comment: Can you please include a option to have the time display as 1 colour instead of this textured format?

author: pmich 5900
comment: Why is the temperature in Celsius?

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Please, change it in the settings app.

author: Joel Enriquez
comment: Looks awesome worth paying premium version

author: David Jag
comment: Nice face.  I really do enjoy it, however minus 1 start due to the compass not working.  It is frozen pointing North.  Am I wrong in assuming it should work like an actual compass.  (Yes, I have GPS turned on)

author: Joshua Johnston
comment: Being spammed by my watch faces to advertise more faces I don't care about is a no no. This face abuses notifications to spam users.

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Hi, please, disable the notification option in the companion app. Some users want to know when new watchface comes out.

author: Teh Dyzaster
comment: Love it, do wish there were more options for design, and the next and back buttons lag or don't work randomly, but after rebooting it normally works for a while.

author: Michael Odisho
comment: Does not work on Moto 360 2gen. Even if they say so.  And I can not get a refund.  Uninstall !!!!  Don't download this app

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Do you have Android Wear 2? Did you tried to install it via Wear store? Please, send us email and we will be happy to help you.

author: DaMainEvent
comment: Really like the app but  no longer vibrate after wear 2 update

author: Jack Stepp
comment: Does not work.  Save your money

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Hi, what doesn't work for you?

author: Ted Lin
comment: Worked when I first downloaded it but after a couple of hours the pro functionality stopped working
Good, practical app, quick launch for stopwatch, timers, etc. But needs a way to save a look for quick switching between looks.

author: Nikolay NvG
comment: Still in the beginning of Use but first impression is Nice...been expecting a little bit more but We'see we'll see ...

author: Ben McKinney
comment: This is a good watch face easy to read and use.

author: Huon White
comment: Good addition to watch face collection

author: Mario Quintanilla
comment: Love it!

author: Jason Moore
comment: If you have already got a version then you shouldn't have to purchase the updated version. That's wrong.

author: Kram Rhewdnal
comment: Love this watch face, would be nice if the date format could be changed to mm/dd/yy.  Update: weather is inaccurate and will not update, lowerd to three stars

author: Kevin Tsz Yung Chu, JP
comment: If the weather conditions can be colorful but not black and white, I will rate higher. Hope you have time to amend as my request after you finish the project for Android Wear 2 watch face.

author: Nathan Krause
comment: Had to uninstall and reinstall to get weather to update again. Besides that...a good free face with a few bells and whistles which are nice

author: Bobby Grube
comment: Like the look but the weather is useless never stays updated. tried all the options available.

author: John Blizz
comment: Great app.  It's has been my main watch face for over 6 months. There is so many configurations you can do with it.  I would recommend it to anyone.
Won't sync with Google fit. Even un-installed and re-installed.

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Hi, have you tried to connected to Google FIT via a companion app?

author: Patrick Parker
comment: Easy to use has many features for being free!

author: hanan amar
comment: Very nice look and easy use

author: Amit Gandhi
comment: Very very very good

author: Harpal Singh
comment: Overall awesome

author: Cassandra Van O'Linda
comment: The look, feel and idea of the app is great. However, I paid for it so I could change the color. Every time I do so it lasts for a little before changing to some other ugly color

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Hi, you probably tap on center accidently. You can lock screen if you like.

author: Ward Mason
comment: Thanks for your time and effort into the app.  I like it!

author: Sergey K
comment: Nice face with the most useful easy accessable features.

author: d0x 360
comment: I'm sorry but you are very deceptive.  First it's made to look like we get more watch faces from inside the app but we have to pay extra for them.    I have no issues paying a few bucks for a quality watch face but I don't like feeling as if I've been tricked.   It should say right in the app description that extra faces shown in the app are extra money.
title: Deceptive and no option for screen off
